sentences.en: Britain's refusal to sell Portugal arms in 1937 still rankled with him.
sentences.cn: 1937年英国拒绝向葡萄牙销售武器的事情仍然令他愤慨。

sentences.en: He persisted in his refusal to pay the money.
Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.cn: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

sentences.en: Her refusal only drew her lover on.
sentences.cn: 她的拒绝只能促使其恋人继续追求她.
他的拒绝打消了我们的热情.

sentences.en: His refusal to agree left him out on a limb.
sentences.cn: 他拒不表示同意,致使自己处于孤立地位.

sentences.en: His refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝交谈完全是因为固执。

sentences.en: I couldn't tell if his refusal to talk was simple stubbornness.
sentences.cn: 我不清楚他拒绝说话是否只是因为他的顽固不化。

sentences.en: I interpreted his silence as a refusal.
sentences.cn: 我把他的沉默看作是拒绝的表示.

sentences.en: Our offer was met with a firm refusal.
sentences.cn: 我们的报价被坚决拒绝.

sentences.en: She gave him a point - blank refusal.
She is likely to give you a flat refusal.
sentences.cn: 她很可能会断然拒绝你。

sentences.en: They cited Alex's refusal to return to the marital home.
sentences.cn: 他们引证了亚历克斯拒绝回到婚后的家中一事。

sentences.en: This was a refusal to change, to make progress.
sentences.cn: 这就是墨守成规, 不愿进步.

sentences.en: Will you give me first refusal on the car, if you decide to sell it?
sentences.cn: 如果你决定出售这辆车，给我优先购买权好吗？

sentences.en: Your patient answer just adds up to refusal.
sentences.cn: 你的耐心的回答等于拒绝.

phrases.tran_cn: 优先取舍权；优先取决运务

trans.tran_en: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something
